r.d: This program tries to reformat and beautify PHP source code files automatically. The program is Open Source and distributed under the terms of PHP Licence. It is written in PHP and has a command line tool. TODO:web frontend
r.n: * Deep changes of PHP_Beautifier_Batch: All the real work is done by subclasses of PHP_Beautifier_Batch (Strategy Pattern?) * Add dependency on Archive_Tar, version 1.19 for batch output.
